newsitem.title: USA: Cirrus Logic offers Dolby audio chip.
newsitem.headline: Cirrus Logic offers Dolby audio chip.

text.p: Crystal Semiconductor said Wednesday it has developed an audio chip to support Dolby Digital Surround and Dolby Pro Logic applications.
The Cirrus Logic Inc subsidiary said the CS4226 chip can replace as many as nine discrete, integrated circuits in an AC-3 home theater application, reducing the cost of these systems.
It said the chip priced at $32.00 in quantities of 1,000. Samples are available now with production quantities planned for the fourth quarter of 1996.
